metadata.title: Auto-join a Cloud Provider
metadata.description: Auto-join enables agents to automatically join other agents running in the cloud. To configure auto-join, specify agent addresses with compute node metadata for the cloud provider instead of an IP address. Use the CLI or an agent configuration file to configure cloud auto-join.
